scripts.copy:web: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force server-dotnet/Health.Api/wwwroot -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path server-dotnet/Health.Api/wwwroot | Out-Null; Copy-Item -Recurse -Force dist/* server-dotnet/Health.Api/wwwroot/"
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run copy:web && dotnet run --project server-dotnet/Health.Api
scripts.publish:arm64: npm run build && npm run copy:web && dotnet publish server-dotnet/Health.Api -c Release -r linux-arm64 -p:DeleteExistingFiles=true -p:SelfContained=false
scripts.publish:fd: npm run build && npm run copy:web && dotnet publish server-dotnet/Health.Api -c Release
